item.description:
Tired of the cold weather and the months of winter ahead of us?

Let's forget all of that and go for drinks and dancing on Friday night!

Andrea, Holly, and Suzanne are the organizers for the event (see RSVPs for the contact numbers). We will start off in the front bar of New Haven's Playwright at 9:30 pm. Once the dancing starts (usually between 11 and 12), we will head to back to the back bar to hit the dancefloor. Once we are on the dancefloor we probably won't be able to hear our cell phones.

According to the website, there is no cover at Playwright on Friday nights.

See you there!

Playwright website
item.how_to_find_us: We will start off in the front bar. Call contact # if you can't find us.
item.name: Friday 1/09/09 - A Night Out Dancing at Playwright
